title: Levels of autism in China similar to the West, joint Chinese-UK study shows

title_detail.value: Levels of autism in China similar to the West, joint Chinese-UK study shows

summary: The first large-scale study of autism in China has revealed that around one in a hundred people in the country has an autism spectrum condition -- the same figure as found in the West.

summary_detail.value: The first large-scale study of autism in China has revealed that around one in a hundred people in the country has an autism spectrum condition -- the same figure as found in the West.
